summary: P1 Features Testing Complete - All features implemented and working correctly. Homepage Page Builder sections verified (Hero, Top Sales, Deal of Day, Promo grid, Brands, Newsletter). Product cards have Wishlist/Compare buttons with working toggle state and toast notifications. Catalog page has Quick Filters, sticky sidebar, active filter chips, empty state, and comparison bar.

issues: Comparison bar only appears on Catalog page, not on Homepage - may want to add global comparison bar component in layout

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Hero carousel section
Homepage loads with Top Sales product section (Топ продажів)
Homepage loads with Deal of Day section (Гаряча ціна дня) with countdown timer
Homepage loads with Promo grid section (Гарячі пропозиції)
Homepage loads with Brands strip section (Популярні бренди)
Homepage loads with Newsletter block with email input
Product cards have Wishlist button (heart icon) in top right
Product cards have Compare button (scale icon) below Wishlist button
Clicking Wishlist button toggles state (red when active) and shows toast 'Додано в обране'
Clicking Wishlist again removes from favorites with toast 'Видалено з обраного'
Clicking Compare button toggles state (blue when active) and shows toast 'Додано до порівняння'
Quick View overlay appears on product card hover with 'Швидкий перегляд' text
Catalog page loads with Quick Filters row (Швидкі фільтри)
Catalog page has sticky sidebar that stays visible on scroll
Active filter chips appear when filters applied (e.g., 'Тільки в наявності')
Filter chips have X button to remove individual filters
Reset all filters button works ('Скинути всі')
Empty state displays when no products match filters ('Товарів не знайдено')
Comparison bar appears at bottom of Catalog page when items added to compare
Comparison bar shows correct item count and link to Compare page
Sort dropdown works (Популярні, Спочатку дешевші, Новинки, etc.)
View mode toggle (grid/list) buttons present
critical_code_review_comments: Consider adding comparison bar as a global component in the layout (currently only on CatalogV2 page)
Product cards appear multiple times on homepage (in Top Sales, Favorites, New sections) causing duplicate data-testid values - works but could be improved by adding section prefix to testids

Catalog page has all quick filters, sticky sidebar, empty state, and comparison bar. Homepage has all sections (Hero, Top Sales, Deal of Day, Promo grid, Brands, Newsletter). The comparison bar component only renders on CatalogV2 page, not globally.
